definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Lipoic Acid is a powerful anti-oxidant and helps protect the brain.
sentences.chinese: 硫辛酸是一种强有力的抗氧化剂有助于保护大脑。

sentences.english: Many people overestimate the benefits of vitamin C and other antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 许多人高估了维C和其它抗氧化剂的好处。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 为了一个额外分量的抗氧化剂，另外再加一杯红酒。

sentences.english: Catechin is a phenol antioxidant found in grape seeds.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄籽中含有的儿茶素是一种酚类抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: Insect-eating songbirds switch to fruits rich in antioxidants before migrating.
sentences.chinese: 食虫鸟类在迁移之前吃富含抗氧化剂的浆果。

sentences.english: Unique peace and quiet dispersant and antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 独特的清净分散剂和抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: I use anthocyanidins and antioxidants in conjunction with the ozone therapy.
sentences.chinese: 我用的是臭氧治疗和抗氧化剂花青素与配合。

sentences.english: In this paper, we report the water soluble antioxidant abstract from useless coffee bean.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了从等外品咖啡豆提取水溶性食品抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: However, current processing techniques for methanotrophic biomass leads to the oxidation of the natural antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 目前甲烷菌的生产工艺导致了天然抗氧化剂的氧化。

sentences.english: Black coffee is calorie-free and rich in antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 黑咖啡几乎不带热量并富含抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: And one of the great antioxidants  is CoffeeBerry, this is RevaleSkin  eye cream.
sentences.chinese: 最好的一种抗氧化剂是咖啡多酚，这是若芙琳眼霜。

sentences.english: They offer protection against a number of diseases, provide you with energy, are full of anti-oxidants and guess what?
sentences.chinese: 它们富含抗氧化剂，为你提供抗疾病的蛋白质和能量。

sentences.english: So why not take some extra antioxidants to protect yourself against cancer?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么不多服用些抗氧化剂来预防癌症呢？

sentences.english: Antioxidants will develop a new effective gastric mucosa protectant with vast prospects.
sentences.chinese: 抗氧化剂作为粘膜保护剂将具有很大应用前景。

sentences.english: An effective antioxidant, vitamin C helps to protect cells against free radical damage.
sentences.chinese: 抗氧化剂，保护细胞免受游离基破坏。

sentences.english: Antioxidants fight free radicals and helps to un-do previous skin damage.
sentences.chinese: 富含抗氧化剂来抗自由基并帮助修复肌肤损伤。

pinyin: zi4 you2 ji1 qing1 chu2 ji4
huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
